instruction.title: Color
instruction.text: In the text, VIEW shows you the articles a, an, the.

instruction.title: Click
instruction.text: Click on each article you find in the text and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong.

instruction.title: Multiple Choice
instruction.text: Choose an article from the drop-down list and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong. You can get help by clicking on ?.

instruction.title: Fill in the blanks
instruction.text: Fill in the blanks with either "who" or "which". Correct answers show up in green. If you guessed wrong or you find it too difficult you can get help by clicking on ?.
